text: I discover an unexpected invention few weeks ago. In some poor Country, there is no runnig and potable water. That's why a lot of scientist try to do an easier life for the inhabitant. This invention has been base on the fact of change no drinkable water to potable water. I think this invention is giving a new futur for poor country. Maybe, this will be the begin of the devellopement for the poorest country.

text: For me, the autonomous car is a technology that I want to work on. I want to understand how that car can drive without a conductor. Many elements in that car seem interesting: We have sensor which allow safety to the conductor. All the data take by sensor need to be treat by an powerfull computer. That computer realises a 3D map which allows to avoid possible gap in the road and executs a program that permorfs the driving of the vehicule. It's a good innovation because it can reduce the risks related to driving a car. The first reason of a driving accident is due to a human error. And that car take off this risk.

text: We call the cell envelope the plasmatic membrane, as opposed to other membranes like the nuclear membrane, and its existence is the main factor that makes for the individuality of a cell, so that explaining its formation is the first step to an understanding of cells themselves. The mechanism of this formation, which is spontaneous and can be reproduced in vitro, only involves the chemical properties of the predominant molecular components of the membrane, phospholipids. These lipids are composed of an hydrophile head and two hydrophobic tails. Due to these characteristics, in a watery solution, they aggregate themselves to form a peculiar pattern which is a spheric double layer. This lipidic double layer is the cell membrane. Considering that cells are the basic component of life, the discovery of a deterministic mechanism for the spontaneous formation of the cell membrane was one of the biggest steps to an understanding of the emergence of life.
